text:
From Figure 4 we see that the total month 185 principal payment is $536,542 and the
total interest payment is $357,040. Tranche A receives principal payments sufficient to
pay off its balance as well as its share of the interest. Tranche B receives the remaining
principal as well as its interest.
Tranche A principal payment = $405,694
Tranche A ending principal balance = $405,694 – $405,694 = $0
Tranche a interest = $405,694x0.085 = $2,874
